title: Key Change: Shirley Manson

title: Episode 293: Anohni
description: “4 Degrees” LISTEN: APPLE · SPOTIFY · AMAZON · OTHER APPS Anohni is a singer and songwriter originally from England, who started putting out music in 2000. She’s released 6 albums, and won the Mercury Prize. She’s also been nominated for two Brit Awards, and an Oscar.
